article_title: The GOP will fall victim to own angry, evangelical excesses
article_text:
The GOP is dead; it can’t win a national election

This is hard for Republicans to grasp because they are thriving in Congress and in states

The Republican Party’s autopsy in November will determine the cause of death was suicide
